name: Terrible Mess in the Store
description:
Web version is no longer supported due to graphical bugs and slow performance. Please download the game at the bottom of the page.

HOW TO PLAY
Go at the stairs when you are 100% sure are done and didn't forget anything.
If you forget to do ONE of those things, you will loose:
Pick the items and put them in the right shelves. You can only carry 3 items at most. You can drop them and it'll magically fall from the sky.
Store all the items, close all the doors (don't touch mind the double door, it's bugged) and shut down the electricity.
If you win (especially Dani) you'll have something funny to see!

CONTROLS
WASD / ZQSD - Walk
E - Interact: Pickup Items / Open/Close Doors
Space - Drop Items

STORY:
You are playing as Jimmy, a guy who never asked anything to anyone.
Today logistic folks thought: "I'm going to end this man's career!"
This man: It's YOU! JIMMY! You must clean this mess before your boss and your colleagues arrive gogogo!

CREDITS

This game has been created in 5 days for the Dani's Basement Game Jam 2:
https://itch.io/jam/danis-basement-jam-2

A game made by CTN Phaco: https://ctn-phaco.itch.io

3D Models made by: Gurjas Studio https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHLhrrU_4t1TLIjOUqUkwkA/videos
